column3: Latest;Ratanakiri province: Police detained twelve Vietnamese and six machines on April 16
column4: 2019.------The Royal Gendarmerie forces handed over the dozen Vietnamese nationals to the immigration police department of Ratanakiri
column5: after cooperation between local police and the Department of Agriculture
column6: Forestry and Fisheries of Rattanakiri in Virachey Ratanakiri National Park.------According to the police
column7: the twelve Vietnamese nationals and six machines came across the border illegally through the forest to log in the protected park.
